column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Common Bond is an exciting addition to the Westheimer brunch scene. With its chic LA feel and fancy foods
column2: you'll feel like you're worlds away from regular ol' Houston. Given how often I come here I probably should be giving them five stars
column3: but I just have a few things that nag at me
column4: and for this price point I wouldn't expect that.
